name: Granblue Fantasy: Versus — Character Pass Set
name_original: Granblue Fantasy: Versus — Character Pass Set
description:
Legendary fighting game studio ARC SYSTEM WORKS and Cygames team up to bring the beloved Granblue Fantasy universe to the home console in an action-packed, head-to-head fighter.

Also includes an RPG mode that features an all-new, original story told through beautifully rendered cutscenes.

Includes a Granblue Fantasy serial code as a purchase bonus!
*Choose one of: Sunlight Stone x1, Gold Brick x1, Sephira Evolite x1, Damascus Crystal x10
*Additional bonuses will be added in the future.
*Each bonus can only be claimed once per Granblue Fantasy account.

Granblue Fantasy: Versus 'Character Pass Set' Contents
• Granblue Fantasy: Versus game
• Character Pass
- 5 DLC characters will be unlocked after launch
• Color Pack
- Customize the base roster of fighters with DLC color variants
• PS4™ Theme
• PSN Avatar Set

*This bundle consists of Granblue Fantasy: Versus and related digital contents. Granblue Fantasy: Versus is also available as a stand-alone purchase. Please check whether you already own the game before you make your purchase

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.


Licensed to and published by XSEED Games / Marvelous USA, Inc.
